types.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to upload files for this bot. Talk to your team owner.

actionButton.description: A button that triggers an action, often used in cards
actionButton.textTitle: Enter text or the ID of a content element (ex: #!builtin_text-myid)
actionButton.title: Action Button

card.description: A card message with a title with optional subtitle, image and action buttons.

carousel.description: A carousel is an array of cards
carousel.title: Carousel

image.description: A message showing an image with an optional title
image.labelDesc: Some platforms require to name the images.
image.title: Image

audio.description: A message showing an audio file with an optional title
audio.title: Audio

video.description: A message showing a video file with an optional title
video.title: Video

file.description: A message showing some file with an optional title
file.title: File

singleChoice.description: Suggest choices to the user with the intention of picking only one (with an optional message)
singleChoice.itemTitle: The title of the choice (this is what gets shown to the user)
singleChoice.itemValue: The value that your bot gets when the user picks this choice (usually hidden from the user)
singleChoice.title: Single Choice

text.description: A regular text message with optional typing indicators and alternates

location.title: Location
location.description: A message showing a location with an optional address and title
location.label: Title

dropdown.asKeyboardDesc: It will be displayed right on top of the composer (like choices)
dropdown.buttonDesc: When left blank, the selected option is sent when the dropdown is closed
dropdown.buttonText: The text to display on the button.
dropdown.desc: Displays a list of options to the user
dropdown.itemLabel: The text displayed in the dropdown menu
dropdown.itemValue: The value that the bot will receive (optional)
dropdown.title: Dropdown
dropdown.widthDesc: The default size displays the select and the button on one line. Change it to fit your needs
dropdown.widthTitle: The width of the component (in pixels)

markdownHelp: Refer to this documentation for markdown syntax:
